item.title: By: Lenny
item.dc:creator: Lenny
item.description: We are looking into Facebook and Open Social at the moment. Hope to have something out soon.
item.content:encoded: We are looking into Facebook and Open Social at the moment. Hope to have something out soon.

item.title: By: walter
item.dc:creator: walter
item.description: @PaulMWatson I like your line of thinking. The pixenate facebook app was basically just a repurposed theme I had lying around - the view essentially remained unchanged - I just plugged in a facebook-specific controller. If OpenSocial wasn't just vaporware I might do something with that too. It would just be a matter of swapping in a different controller that used the OpenSocial API instead of Facebook's.
item.content:encoded: @PaulMWatson I like your line of thinking. The pixenate facebook app was basically just a repurposed theme I had lying around – the view essentially remained unchanged – I just plugged in a facebook-specific controller. If OpenSocial wasn’t just vaporware I might do something with that too. It would just be a matter of swapping in a different controller that used the OpenSocial API instead of Facebook’s.

item.title: By: Paul M. Watson
item.dc:creator: Paul M. Watson
item.description: I voted for the first option however the app isn't limited to Facebook but will work across OpenSocial, Facebook etc.
item.content:encoded: I voted for the first option however the app isn’t limited to Facebook but will work across OpenSocial, Facebook etc.
